mapper.update: update t_industryp set indp_num = #{indpNum,jdbcType=CHAR}, indp_name = #{indpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, limit_dep_id = #{limitDepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_r_date = #{createRDate,jdbcType=DATE}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_username = #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, ordered = #{ordered,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delflag = #{delflag,jdbcType=BIT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, indp_num, indp_name, limit_dep_id, create_r_date, create_time, create_user, create_username, update_time, ordered, delflag, remark from t_industryp where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
